T02D2165:270a-1: pra tya sa mutpa da sya n'a ma raksha /
T02D2165:270a-3: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i srung ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2165:270a-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2165:270a-5: bde gshegs mthu dang sems can las //
T02D2165:270a-6: bsam gyis mi khyad par bshad pas //
T02D2165:270a-7: de bzhin rten 'brel nus pa'i mthu //
T02D2165:270a-8: bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas //
T02D2165:270a-9: gnod byed rnams kyi dgrar gyur pa //
T02D2165:270a-10: mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D2165:270a-11: srung byed rnam rgyal aa ru ra //
T02D2165:270a-12: bcangs sam lus la brten pa yis //
T02D2165:270a-13: mar me'i snang bas mun sel ltar //
T02D2165:270a-14: phyogs su gnas par mi nus so //
T02D2165:270a-15: don kun grub byed nor bu dang //
T02D2165:270a-16: de bzhin tshe bsring nor bu dang //
T02D2165:270a-17: aindra n'i la spur long dang //
T02D2165:270a-18: rin chen nor bu sna tshogs nor //
T02D2165:270a-19: gang zhig lus la 'chang byed pa //
T02D2165:270a-20: nor bu'i mthu ni bsam mi khyab //
T02D2165:270a-21: nyi ma shar sar grib mi gnas //
T02D2165:270a-22: de bzhin gdon de mi gnas so //
T02D2165:270a-23: bde gshegs dgra bcom byang chub sems //
T02D2165:270b-0: de @270b bzhin rnal 'byor pa yi gdung //
T02D2165:270b-1: mchod cing bcangs pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2165:270b-2: zhe sdang zhi nas mchod byed 'gyur //
T02D2165:270b-3: lnga brgya stong du lon pa yi //
T02D2165:270b-5: sngags btab bskus pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2165:270b-6: dpag tshad bye ba brgya ru 'bros //
T02D2165:270b-7: dug dgra'i mkhris pa ma rul ba //
T02D2165:270b-8: man ngag gis ni brten byas na //
T02D2165:270b-9: klu yi rgyal po 'jog po yis //
T02D2165:270b-10: bzung ba yang ni gtong bar 'gyur //
T02D2165:270b-11: gser chu dngul chu mu zi yi //
T02D2165:270b-12: bcud len la sogs sbyor bas ni //
T02D2165:270b-13: gdon de nye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2165:270b-14: 'di la ma dang rigs ma yin //
T02D2165:270b-15: 'bras bu gsum dang bhri ngag ra //
T02D2165:270b-16: sbrang rtsi mar dang ldan pa dang //
T02D2165:270b-17: sna tshogs pa yi sman rnams kyi //
T02D2165:270b-18: nus pa brjod kyis mi lang bas //
T02D2165:270b-19: rtag tu goms par byas pas ni //
T02D2165:270b-20: gdon de bzlog par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2165:270b-21: ga pur la sogs bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D2165:270b-22: rgyun du lus la bsten pa yis //
T02D2165:270b-23: gdon de phyogs su mi nye'o //
T02D2165:270b-24: 'di yi nus pa bsam mi khyab //
T02D2165:270b-25: ga pur dz'a ti tsandan dang //
T02D2165:270b-26: gla rtsi gur gum dri lnga ni //
T02D2165:270b-27: rtag tu lus la brten pa yis //
T02D2165:270b-28: tshor ba tsam gyis bye bar 'bros //
T02D2165:270b-29: gu gul la sogs sbyar ba'i spos //
T02D2165:270b-30: bcangs sam bdugs pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2165:270b-32: / skad cig tsam yang mi gnas so //
T02D2165:270b-33: gsum lnga bdun dgu lon pa yi //
T02D2165:270b-34: shin tu skyur ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2165:270b-35: me yi phung po'i rtse mo la //
T02D2165:270b-36: sbrang bu la sogs mi gnas ltar //
T02D2165:270b-38: sbyor ba 'di ni bsngags pa yin //
T02D2165:270b-39: dgu gsum nyi shu lnga bcu gcig / brgya la sogs pa lon pa yin //
T02D2165:270b-40: rtsi mar gyi ni 'khru sman bzhin //
T02D2165:270b-42: zla ba'i shel las chu 'byung dang //
T02D2165:270b-43: nyi ma'i shel las me 'byung ba //
T02D2165:270b-44: mi rigs par ni smra min pas //
T02D2165:270b-45: de bzhin sna tshogs rten 'brel mthu //
T02D2165:270b-46: med pa ru ni mi smra'o //
T02D2165:270b-47: mthu ni mngon du 'byung bas na //
T02D2165:270b-48: ma dad pa ni rigs med pas //
T02D2165:270b-49: de la yid ches brtan par bzung //
T02D2165:270b-50: rten 'brel sbyor ba bcu gnyis la //
T02D2165:270b-51: dad pas bla ma mnyes byas te //
T02D2165:270b-52: man ngag rim pa blang bar bya //
T02D2165:270b-53: mnyes pa yis ni gzhan du min //
T02D2165:271a-2: rang nyid kyis mthong 'ga' tsam smras //
T02D2165:271a-3: 'di la dge rtsa ci yod pas //
T02D2165:271a-4: gdug pa rnams ni srung byed shog / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i srung ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2165:271a-5: nam gru'i rigs las byung ba /
T02D2165:271a-6: dngos grub brnyes pa dz'a ba ri'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2165:271a-8: // / pandi ta de ba p'u rna ma ti dang /
